pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Tensorflow Extra> Extra Utilities for Tensorflow# Installation```shellpip install tensorflow-extra```# Activations## SmeLU: Smooth ReLU```pyimport tensorflow as tfimport tensorflow_extra as tfea = tf.constant([-2.5, -1.0, 0.5, 1.0, 2.5])b = tfe.activations.smelu(a) # array([0., 0.04166667, 0.6666667 , 1.0416666 , 2.5])```
